Articles.Content:
So the latest launch of the Ariane 5 inspired me to recreate the heavy-lift workhorse. I hope you enjoy the craft as much as I do. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

**Download Here:** [MoonMans Ariane-5](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B85Yjo0AawAyUnk5ejZLeGlwZlk/view?usp=sharing)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ZsgSm)

Very nice! Good work.. does it come with payloads?

Repped!
Thank you! Glad you like it! It comes with the one shown in the images but if you ever need more or if you would like me to recreate some of its real payloads i can. Thank you for the Rep!
